Attacks.Name: Body Slam
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, after this attack is resolved the target character is Pushed S and gains the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: Razor Leaf Barrage
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to each enemy character within range and line of sight of the target character.

Attacks.Name: Leech Seed
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target character gains the Sap special condition. When that character advances or climbs, it suffers 1 damage and this character gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Overgrow
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 3 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of its 'Razor Leaf Barrage' attack by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Scent of Vitality
Superpowers.Effect: Allied characters within range remove one special condition and gain 1 power.

Attacks.Name: Solar Beam
Attacks.Effect: This attack requires one turn to charge before it can be used. After charging, on the next activation of this character, use this attack without paying its power cost. If a wild is rolled, the target character is Staggered.

Superpowers.Name: Light Screen
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of this character's next activation, allied characters within range 3 add 1 die to their Defense rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Meganium character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
